And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Cryo Cicin Mage's Impromptu Jig

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "Ah, I had a lucky friend that once passed through the tent of a Cryo Cicin Mage! They said that the mage's dance steps had no fixed rhythm to them..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage" starts with Talent Card "Cicin's Cold Glare" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Cicin's Cold Glare
customize.desc:
Cryo Cicin Mage: Cicin's Cold Glare

More Mist Grass means more friendly Cryo Cicins.

...But what happens when the Mist Grass is used up?

Perhaps she never considered this.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Cryo Cicin Mage's Greetings

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "But when greeting allies from afar or when faced with a powerful foe, a Cryo Cicin Mage will respond with a dignified dance to show her respect..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage" starts with the Talent Card "Cicin's Cold Glare" equipped, and the Mirror Maiden starts with the Talent Card "Mirror Cage" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Cryo Cicin Mage

value.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
value.desc:
A Fatui mage who can command Cryo Cicins in battle. Their origins and what they look like under that mask are both mysteries.
Reason dictates that those who lack Visions should not be able to control the elements as these mages do. However, in addition to using Mist Grass to control the Cryo Cicins, they also boldly wield the might of frost. Seeing them as they wander the land in their seemingly aimless way, one can't help but wonder about the duty that must compel them...

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 5 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> , grants this character <color=#99ffff>Cryo Application</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Flowing Cicin Shield</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Flowing Cicin Shield</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
Provides <color=#ffffff>1 Shield point</color> for your active character.
<color=#ffffff>When created</color> : If you have <color=#ffffff>Cryo Cicins</color> on the field, additionally increase <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> by the amount of Usage(s) it has. (Adds a maximum of 3 additional <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> )

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : Deal 1 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color>
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color> (Can stack, max 3 stacks)
<color=#ffffff>After Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage performs a Normal Attack</color> : This card gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage takes Elemental Reaction DMG</color> :This card loses 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> .

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
<color=#99ffff>Cryo Application</color>
When Cryo is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : No effect
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : No effect
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : The target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
